title: Bug 4971 Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 describes an issue with the 'copy package' feature in the Eclipse JDT UI. The bug report lacks sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections. Based on the provided information, I will supplement the bug report to make it clearer.
OB: When selecting xxx as the destination in the 'copy package' feature in Eclipse JDT UI, the package is not copied correctly.
EB: The 'copy package' feature should copy the package to the specified destination, which should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new project named xxx.
2. In the Package Viewer, select a package in the project (e.g., from the context menu).
3. Choose the 'copy' option from the context menu.
4. Select 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as the destination package.
